description:
ABOUT THE POSITION:

We are looking for a highly motivated .NET developer with expirience in Web development using Microsoft stack of technologies. The successful candidate will be responsible for developing applications in C#, VB.NET, and SQL Server database. The individual should have experience throughout the full SDLC and is able to adapt to new technologies.
†


RESPONSIBILITIES:

Х Analyze and enhance existing product code

Х Design and code new features of existing code and new applications using C#. VB.NET, and T-SQL

Х Work as a member of a team in different locations and time-zones.

Х Understand business requirements and customer needs.


QUALIFICATIONS:
Х Minimum 3 years coding experience using C# and T-SQL.
Х Experience with .Net framework v. 3.5+.
Х Experience with SQL Server 2008.
Х Experience with HTML 5, XML, JavaScript.
Х Familiar with Web services development and utilization.
Х Familiar with unit testing and related tools.
Х Self-directed and willing to take ownership of components.
Х Analytical and problem-solving abilities with strong attention to detail.
Х VB.Net and ASP.Net is a plus.
Х AWS and cloud databases experience is a plus.


CONDITIONS:
Х We offer attractive working conditions; financial stability; good career growth opportunities; Interesting and challenging projects; convenient office location; friendly team and enjoyable working environment.
name: Developer .NET
